edu.cmu.sphinx.fst

Class Fst

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.fst.Fst
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImmutableFst

    public class Fst
extends java.lang.Object
    A mutable finite state transducer implementation. Holds an ArrayList of State objects allowing additions/deletions.
